country.name: Morocco
country.description: Morocco is renowned for its rich history and cultural heritage. The country excels in athletics, particularly in long-distance running, and has competitive performances in football.

country.name: Dominica
country.description: Dominica is known for its natural beauty and emerging sports talent. It has competitive performances in athletics and swimming.

country.name: Pakistan
country.description: Pakistan is known for its strong traditions in cricket and field hockey. The country also has emerging talent in sports such as athletics and squash.

country.name: Turkiye
country.description: Turkiye (Turkey) is known for its rich cultural history and contributions to various sports. It excels in wrestling, weightlifting, and football.

country.name: Mexico
country.description: Mexico is renowned for its vibrant culture and achievements in sports such as football, boxing, and athletics. The country also has a strong tradition in baseball.

country.name: Armenia
country.description: Armenia is known for its rich cultural heritage and achievements in sports like wrestling and weightlifting.

country.name: Colombia
country.description: Colombia is recognized for its vibrant culture and strong performances in sports like cycling, football, and weightlifting.

country.name: Kyrgyzstan
country.description: Kyrgyzstan is known for its stunning landscapes and strong tradition in wrestling and weightlifting. The country is emerging as a competitive force in various sports.

country.name: Democratic People's Republic of Korea
country.description: North Korea is known for its strong emphasis on sports, particularly in wrestling, weightlifting, and gymnastics. The country has a rigorous training system for its athletes.

country.name: Lithuania
country.description: Lithuania is known for its achievements in basketball and strong performances in athletics. The country has a rich sporting culture and history.
